sqlQuery.name: GeneComments
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT gf.source_id, '@project_id@' AS project_id, c.comment_id, NVL(c.headline, SUBSTR(c.content,0,20) || '...') AS headline, c.content, c.location_string, (u.first_name || ' ' || u.last_name) AS user_name, u.organization, c.comment_date, (c.project_name || ' ' || c.project_version) as project_name_version, c.review_status_id FROM @LOGIN_SCHEMA@users@LOGIN_DBLINK@ u, @COMMENT_SCHEMA@comments@COMMENT_DBLINK@ c, dots.GeneFeature gf WHERE lower(u.email) = lower(c.email) AND c.comment_target_id='gene' AND c.stable_id = gf.source_id AND gf.source_id = $$source_id$$ AND c.review_status_id != 'rejected' ORDER BY c.comment_date DESC

sqlQuery.name: SequenceComments
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT ens.source_id, '@project_id@' AS project_id, c.comment_id, NVL(c.headline, SUBSTR(c.content,0,20) || '...') AS headline, c.content, c.location_string, (u.first_name || ' ' || u.last_name) AS user_name, u.organization, c.comment_date, (c.project_name || ' ' || c.project_version) as project_name_version, c.review_status_id FROM @LOGIN_SCHEMA@users@LOGIN_DBLINK@ u, @COMMENT_SCHEMA@comments@COMMENT_DBLINK@ c, dots.ExternalNaSequence ens WHERE lower(u.email) = lower(c.email) AND c.comment_target_id='genome' AND c.stable_id = ens.source_id AND ens.source_id = $$source_id$$ AND c.review_status_id != 'rejected' ORDER BY c.comment_date DESC
